item.title: Istio, Cert-Manager and Let's Encrypt April '20
item.description: What is this? It is very easy to find blog posts and articles explaining how to make some of these components work together. They are also completely outdated. It is not their fault: Kubernetes moves fast, Istio’s development seems to move even faster, and cert-manager breaks backward compatibility. Chances are, by the time you read it it will be too late! Anyway, in a futile attempt to remain somewhat ahead of the curve, this article was written for Istio-1.
